description:
A soft button-up for those times you’re looking for flannel-like comfort but you’re not feeling plaid. Crafted from a gentle cotton moleskin, the Huntly feels like a well-worn favourite since day 1.

  • Hearty cotton moleskin has just a hint of spandex for a comfortable stretch
  • Shirt-tail hem works with a tuck and has a dynamic movement when open
  • Dual chest pockets and hand pockets give you lots of room
  • Uses Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) cotton. The BCI is a not-for-profit association committed to a holistic approach to sustainable cotton production
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
  • Relaxed fit leaves room to layer
name: Kathmandu Huntly Moleskin Long Sleeve Shirt - Men's
